summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 4 October to end of Monday 4 October GMT
description: On Monday our weather continues to be dominated by an Atlantic low pressure system located to the north of the UK.<br/><br/>A fresh 'Atlantic' south-westerly airflow is expected throughout the day ensuring good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
